title: Markha Valley
subtitle: Ladakh’s green valley route
about: Markha Valley is a lush corridor in Ladakh that connects high desert plateaus with villages, gompas and rugged side ridges. The trail offers surprising green camps, river crossings and a chance to meet remote Himalayan communities.
seo_title: Markha Valley Trek — Ladakh Village Trails
seo_description: A scenic Ladakh trek through green valleys, remote villages and dramatic high desert landscapes.

trek_places.name: Markha Village
trek_places.about: Markha gives an intimate look at Ladakhi mountain agriculture and hospitality. Trekkers often stay in local homestays and learn about traditional life.
what_to_do: Walk the nearby fields and photogenic lanes
